articles.title: Gauff, 19, earns Cincinnati women's title by beating Muchova in straight sets - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Gauff, the 2022 French Open runner-up, earned her first Masters 1000 title when Muchova sailed a forehand return wide on Gauff's fourth match point. | Tennis News
articles.content:
Seventh-seeded Coco Gauff became the first teenager in more than 50 years to win the Western & Southern Open with a 6-3, 6-4 victory over Karolina Muchova.
